mapper.select: select lec_no , lec_name , lecture_date from open_lec join lecture using(lec_no) where mem_no=#{memNo}

select l.lecstu_no , l.lec_no , b.file_no , b.file_path , b.filesystem_name , b.original_name , l.major_name , l.major_no , l.stu_no , l.stu_name , s.attendance from lec_stu l left join board_attach b on (b.ref_type = 'S' and b.ref_no = l.lecstu_no) left outer join stu_attend s on (l.stu_no = s.stu_no and s.lecture_date = #{lectureDate}) order by l.stu_no asc

select l.major_name , l.stu_no , l.stu_name , l.lec_no , l.major_no , s.attendance from lec_stu l left join stu_attend s on (l.stu_no = s.stu_no) where l.lec_no=#{lecNo} and to_char(lecture_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{date}

where lecture_date = #{lectureDate}
mapper.select: select open_lec_no , ol.lec_no , l.lec_name , j.major_name , m.mem_name , r.res_name from open_lec ol join member m on ol.mem_no = m.mem_no join lecture l on ol.lec_no = l.lec_no join major j on j.major_no = l.major_no join resources r on r.res_no = ol.res_no
select res_no , res_name from resources where res_type='2' and use_status='N' order by res_no

select open_lec_no , ol.lec_no , lec_name , m.mem_name , to_char(ol.start_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') start_date , to_char(ol.end_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') end_date , ol.lecture_date , start_time , end_time , max_student , ol.res_no , ol.mem_no from open_lec ol join lecture l on l.lec_no=ol.lec_no join member m on m.mem_no =ol.mem_no where open_lec_no=#{openLecNo}
